  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_en/140065</entry>
          </identifier>

            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:colos_en/140065</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kako sešteti sile</string>
            <string language="en">How to add up forces</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie man oben Kräfte hinzufügt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment ajouter des forces</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como adicionar acima forças</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come aggiungere in su le forze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς να προσθέσει επάνω τις δυνάμεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo agregar para arriba fuerzas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Telo pripeto na tri vzmeti niha okrog ravnovesne lege in pri tem opazujemo velikost in smer sil.</string>
            <string language="en">Object attached to three springs is oscillating about equilibrium position. Observe the forces in this process.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vektor</string>
            <string language="en">vector</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">sila</string>
            <string language="en">force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ravnovesna lega</string>
            <string language="en">stable equilibrium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mehanika</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Nachricht, die zu drei Frühlingen angebracht
wird, oszilliert über Gleichgewichtposition. Beobachten Sie die
Kräfte in diesem Prozeß.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'objet fixé à trois ressorts oscille au sujet 
de la position d'équilibre. Observez les forces dans ce 
processus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O objeto unido a três molas está oscilando 
sobre a posição do equilíbrio. Observe as forças neste 
processo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'oggetto fissato alle tre molle sta oscillando 
circa la posizione di equilibrio. Osservi le forze in questo 
processo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το αντικείμενο που συνδέεται με τρία ελατήρια 
ταλαντεύεται για τη θέση ισορροπίας. Παρατηρήστε τις 
δυνάμεις σε αυτήν την διαδικασία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El objeto asociado a tres resortes está 
oscilando sobre la posición del equilibrio. Observe las fuerzas
en este proceso.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vektor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">beständiges Gleichgewicht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vecteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">équilibre stable</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vetor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">equilíbrio estável</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">equilibrio stabile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σταθερή ισορροπία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
